org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state

类 RocksDBKeyedStateBackend.RocksDBFullSnapshotOperation<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state.RocksDBKeyedStateBackend.RocksDBFullSnapshotOperation<K>
  • 封闭类:
    RocksDBKeyedStateBackend<K>

    static final class RocksDBKeyedStateBackend.RocksDBFullSnapshotOperation<K>
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the process to perform a snapshot of a RocksDBKeyedStateBackend.
